alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Crawford County through 815 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Union City to near Meadville to near Greenville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Titusville, Riceville, Lincolnville, Canadohta Lake, Guys Mills, Atlantic, Cochranton, Hydetown, Blooming Valley, Townville, Spartansburg and Geneva. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
